name: Amber
desc: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: Outrider Amber reporting for duty! Just say the word if you ever need my help!

voice.title: Chat: Hobbies
voice.desc: I feel like running.

voice.title: Chat: Longings
voice.desc: Jean will be upset if she catches us lazing around like this.

voice.title: Chat: New Discoveries
voice.desc: Hey, there's something strange over there... C'mon, let's take a look!

voice.title: When It Rains: Worries
voice.desc: Oh no, it's raining... now my uniform will get all wet...

voice.title: When It Rains: Reminder
voice.desc: It's raining again... This will hinder our vision, we must remain vigilant!

voice.title: After the Rain
voice.desc: Wow~ This weather is awesome!

voice.title: When the Sun Is Out
voice.desc: If only the wind was a little stronger...

voice.title: When It's Windy: Pleasant
voice.desc: This breeze... so refreshing!

voice.title: When It's Windy: Relax
voice.desc: I love this kind of weather, ahh... so relaxing~

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Morning! Want to go on a jog?

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: Can I get lunch with you?

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: It's getting late, should I light a torch?

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: Agreed, getting rest is essential! Let's meet here tomorrow then. See ya!

voice.title: About Amber
voice.desc: Mondstadt Gliding Champion, yep, that's me! Gliding Champion!

voice.title: About Us: Contests
voice.desc: Remember that I don't go easy on anyone, even you!

voice.title: About Us: Gliding
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

When I'm teaching you to glide, I feel like I can go even faster than usual... Huh? What are you laughing at? I'll prove it! We can race — right now!

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

My Vision... Is a sign that the Archons believe in me. Yes, I must become the best Outrider I can possibly be!

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: The view from the Cathedral's clock tower is amazing! You should check it out.

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: Look, there's a pigeon over there! *giggle* I wish I could fly alongside them.

voice.title: About Jean: Help
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

After the Grand Master left on his expedition, all the affairs of the Knights of Favonius, both big and small, have been left up to Jean. If only there was more I could do to help her...

voice.title: About Jean: Care
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Jean might still be working? We should invite her for coffee... Let's go.

voice.title: About Lisa: Listening to Stories
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

When you have time, we should go see Lisa! Last time I saw her, she was telling me about a story involving a treasure in the Dragonspine area. But, we got cut off before she could finish. I can't wait to hear the rest of her story!

voice.title: About Lisa: Admiration
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

If Lisa's not sleeping, she'll be reading! I don't know how she does it, I wouldn't be able to sit still for that long.

voice.title: About Kaeya: Concerns
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

...I'm feeling uneasy all of a sudden! Was that Kaeya with you earlier? Did he give you any trouble?

voice.title: About Kaeya: Culprit
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

There's something weird-looking about the dandelions in the garden... Hmm, I bet Kaeya had something to do with this!

voice.title: About Bennett
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Hmm? Bennett... I feel like I've heard that name before... Oh! Yes, he's that hot-blooded guy from the Adventurers' Guild, right! I tend to come across him way out in the wild from time to time, he seems to really love treasure hunting.

voice.title: About Klee
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Klee? She can be a bit cheeky sometimes, but everyone in the Knights of Favonius likes her. Although... I really ought to keep a closer eye on her if I wanna keep her from getting put in confinement by Jean again.

voice.title: About Albedo
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Albedo spends most of his time in his workshop, tinkering away with all of his awesome stuff. But, when you see him in person, you never can quite tell what he's thinking... Who knows what goes on in that mind of his...

voice.title: About Noelle
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

You wanna know about Noelle? She's super resilient. Still, since she's younger than us we should still look out for her.

voice.title: About Eula
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Eula is a great friend of mine! You just need to get used to her sense of humor and you'll get along fine! The only reason she's misunderstood by so many people is her family name. How can I get them to see her for who she really is?

voice.title: About Collei
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises"

Collei wrote to me saying that her Eleazar has been completely cured... I'm so happy for her! I wish I could fly to her side right now and give her the biggest hug! She also said she misses everyone in Mondstadt, and that once she's ready, she'll come visit us in person and tell us all about her progress... Oh, it would be great if she could make it in time for the next Ludi Harpastum. Aaah I can't wait to see her again!

voice.title: About Mika
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Oh! Mika's a veteran of Eula's team. When he first arrived, it was always "Yes, Commander!" every time he spoke to me — I guess it must have been because he saw how close I was with Eula. But then, even after I told him I was actually an Outrider, he still called me "Ma'am"... It was so embarrassing. We have completely different responsibilities, after all. I definitely could never match his expertise in cartography.

voice.title: More About Amber: I
voice.desc: I'm a pro at hunting, you know! How about I show you some of my skills? Or even better... how about a little competition?

voice.title: More About Amber: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

I'll share my ultimate Gliding Champion secret with you! The most important thing to remember, is to have courage!

voice.title: More About Amber: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I'm really not that good with riddles. I always try to avoid the riddles stand during Ludi Harpastum... What about you?

voice.title: More About Amber: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

I joined the Knights because of my grandpa, I stayed because of Jean. And now, you're the one that showed me the world beyond Mondstadt. I couldn't be happier.

voice.title: More About Amber: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

I would like to explore the other worlds beyond. I wanna see how deep the rabbit hole goes! You'll keep me company, right?

voice.title: Amber's Hobbies
voice.desc: Baron Bunny, today is another squeaky clean day!

voice.title: Amber's Troubles
voice.desc: Oh... Do you have any idea how to make a decent Moon Pie?

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: Jean makes the most amazing cup of coffee! You'll have to try it sometime.

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: I can handle anything and everything! As long as it isn't cold Wolfhook juice... Ugh, yuck...

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Wow! This is delicious, you're an amazing cook!

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: I wish I was as good at cooking as you...

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Uh, I'm just not used to this taste, sorry! Nothing to do with you of course!

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Hey, happy birthday! Here, I have a gift for you: an exclusive, custom-made version of Baron Bunny that I sewed for you myself. ...Don't worry, "custom-made" means that it won't explode!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 1

Yeah! As fast as riding the wind!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 2

At this speed, no one can keep up with me!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 4

The skies over Mondstadt seem to have gotten smaller... or is it that my sight reaches further than ever before?

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 6

It seems that now... I've improved so much compared to when we first met! Hehe, thank you so much! Let me treat you to a Sticky Honey Roast! Let's go, let's go!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Get them!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Go go Baron Bunny!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: ♪Hmm~ hmm~ hmm~ hmm~ hmm~

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: No one escapes my sights!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Let it rain!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: No escape!

voice.title: Sprint Start: I
voice.desc: I'll race you there!

voice.title: Sprint Start: II
voice.desc: Betcha can't keep up with me!

voice.title: Sprint End: I
voice.desc: Told you I'd win.

voice.title: Sprint End: II
voice.desc: That's more like it!

voice.title: Deploying Wind Glider: I
voice.desc: Get ready for the Gliding Champion of Mondstadt!

voice.title: Deploying Wind Glider: II
voice.desc: I won't let you down!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: Opening a chest is like unwrapping a gift!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Another target tracked down by Outrider Amber!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Wow, these will come in handy!

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: I'll never surrender!

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Ouch! Meanie...

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: *panting* Ugh... You'll... pay for that!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: Take cover!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Hey... Need some help?

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Tired...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: Must keep... training...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: You got me...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Hey!

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Ugh, not so hard!

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: II
voice.desc: That's cheating!

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: Leave it to me!

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: At the ready!

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Outrider Amber, reporting!

value.name: 100% Outrider
value.desc: Amber's outfit. This is a more formal — but no less cool — version of the Outrider's uniform!

value.name: Outrider's Champion Steak!
value.desc: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.

value.name: Amber
value.desc:
"Outrider" Amber

If you want to be a great player...

First, you have to have the courage to sit down and play.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>June 15, 2019</color>
Check out the fiery flash in the sky — it's Amber! Her vitality and gliding skills are out of this world.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1140113833026936832</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 31, 2020</color>
Travelers, the voice artists for Outrider Amber have been officially announced. Go listen to them now!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/72160</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 10, 2020</color>
I knew you wouldn't forget my birthday, Traveler!
Thank you... But wait, why are you standing so far away?
Hehe, don't worry, this Baron Bunny won't explode! Here, why don't you try giving it a hug?
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/15011</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 10, 2020</color>
"Mondstadt's winds of freedom are the best birthday present for me!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/15021</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 10, 2021</color>
What's up? Do you need hel- AHH! You scared me!
The confetti is so pretty! There's also a Baron Bunny cake... Did you make that just for me?
Wow! You've made my day, thank you so very much!
Why don't we have some cake right now? And then we could have a gliding race afterwards!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/674806</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 10, 2021</color>
"Oh, you wanna challenge me in a gliding competition? Sure! Remember that I don't go easy on anyone, even you Paimon!"
"The pigeons over there are really chubby, how cute~ Oops— I forgot I'm in a race now!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/677017</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 10, 2022</color>
"The view from this tall clock tower is amazing! You think so too, don't you?"
"Thank you, Traveler. Let's have another gliding competition next time!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/6857292</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 10, 2022</color>
There you are! Hehe, I've been waiting forever!
You mentioned that you're heading to Sumeru, so I prepared some useful items for the trip. If you don't mind, take them with you.
Don't worry, I've also prepared travel essentials for my friends in the past, I'm pretty experienced!
Hmm... If only I could go with you... I wonder if the trees in Sumeru are taller than the one in Windrise?
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/6857296</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 10, 2023</color>
"Follow me, Traveler! We've got a feast to get back to!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/20767648</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 10, 2023</color>
What delightful weather! I've brought Baron Bunny out to get some sun.
It was so miserable before with all that rain, I thought I was going to turn into a Sumeru mushroom!
Mm~ The smell of wild flowers in blossom! Spending time in the sun always lifts your spirits.
Do you have any plans? Once Baron Bunny's warmed up, let's go out for a meal! I'll treat you to an ice-cold drink!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/20767665</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 10, 2024</color>
"If only I could fly with these pigeons! Ah, I think I might've stared at them for too long, Timmie is starting to glare at me..."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/31982880</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 10, 2024</color>
See? Told you there would be lots of Anemo Crystalflies here, hehe!
As an Outrider, it's definitely my job to lead the way to these hidden spots!
Wait, do you smell something...? Ah, it's buttered pancakes! Did you make these yourself? They even look so cute!
Here, the hardest-working master chef should get the first bite!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/31982881</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 14, 2019</color>
There'll always be peace under the wings of the Knights of Favonius, as long as you are in the wind.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1139533292338913281</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 13, 2019</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
In Liyue Harbor, under the bright moon. The fragrance of osmanthus and the people admiring the moon are all shrouded in the bright silver glow. On this Mid-Autumn Festival night, why not put aside your daily chores and quietly enjoy this rare beauty?
“Travelers, let’s try Liyue’s special delicacies together.”
Thanks to the artist @青君-修仙greetings
~ Wishing everyone a happy Mid-Autumn Festival!
<color=#ffacff>Miyoushe:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.miyoushe.com/ys/article/178766</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 31, 2019</color>
Cape, bat, and pumpkin lantern. The Rose Witch is off~
Candy, candles and slimes! Enjoy the Halloween fun~
"The cathedral entrance is not for such revelry!"
—Did someone just say something? Or am I just hearing things...?
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1189859595650506752</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 14, 2020</color>
Travelers, do you remember what day is it today?
Today is THE day to exchange gifts. Here are the biscuits I made myself, JUST - FOR - YOU! Hurry up and taste it!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/10191</color>

<color=#ffd780>May 14, 2020</color>
Travelers, are you ready to embark on your next journey?
Thanks to 間久ざむち for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1260782000920604672</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 23, 2020</color>
5 days until the global release of Genshin Impact on the PlayStation®4, iOS, Android, and PC platforms.
Travelers, are your ready?
Your journey of exploration across worlds is about to begin!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/17211</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 26, 2020</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
There are 2 days left for the global simultaneous public beta of "Genshin Impact"!
"Hehe~ The cooking skills I learned from Xiangling this time must impress the travelers!"
<color=#ffacff>Mihoyo:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/116268</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 27, 2020</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Genshin Impact will be launched on multiple platforms simultaneously. Are travelers ready?
<color=#ffacff>Bilibili:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/t.bilibili.com/92493352?type=2</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 28, 2020</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
[To celebrate the official release! Twitter icons distributed!]
To commemorate the official release, we will be distributing Twitter icons!
Please use it!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1310425266129305606</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 14, 2021</color>
Today's Jean's birthday, and the Knights of Favonius have secretly prepared a full spread of fine dishes for her, just to celebrate the special occasion!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/242665</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 20, 2021</color>
Spring means cherry blossoms, and cherry blossoms mean cherry blossom viewing! And when it comes to cherry blossom viewing, dumplings are better than flowers, right?
It was so much fun to view the cherry blossoms with you and Amber!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1373122124018163713</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 27, 2021</color>
whispering "Traveler, the place Amber said where they buried the treasure should be right in front. I wonder what kind of gift the other Knights prepared?"
"Klee, let the treasure hunt challenge begin! Let's see who can find the treasure first! Wait, be careful, don't fall—"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/606963</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 25, 2021</color>
"You gave me quite a scare! Amber, vengeance will be..."
"Hehe, the Traveler and I brought you your favorite drink! How about we try it together?"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1287824</color>

<color=#ffd780>December 24, 2021</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
Let's bring the gifts to everyone before the bell rings!
Thanks to the Artist: Hanasa_Criin
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/paimon_genshin7/status/1474228339464458245</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 25, 2022</color>
"Ah! That was refreshing! Thank you for the chilled drinks, Amber!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/13031325</color>

<color=#ffd780>November 25, 2022</color>
I received an invitation letter for a banquet tonight, but I don't know if I should go...
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Paimon2theMoon/status/1595960463715667969</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 21, 2023</color>
"C'mon, Noelle, let's go. Take the day off today!"
"But... I'm not done cleaning."
"Hehe. Just think of it as me asking you a favor!"
"I... understand. If this can aid you, then let's go."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/17144817</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 27, 2023</color>
"Can you see it now, Klee?"
"Oh wowee! Thank you Amber, I've never seen Mondstadt like this before!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/20432897</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 31, 2024</color>
What a hoppy day it is! Whoa, quite a collection you've got there, Baron Bunny!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Paimon2theMoon/status/1774421391888015444</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 29, 2020</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Hello travelers, the number of fans at the official Bilibili of Genshin Impact has exceeded 3 million.
<color=#ffacff>Bilibili:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/t.bilibili.com/440356116328687108</color>
Genshin Impact JP Twitter - 500 Thousand Followers Celebration

<color=#ffd780>October 12, 2020</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
Thanks to Traveler, the official Genshin Twitter account (@Genshin_7) has surpassed 500,000 followers!
To show our gratitude, we're giving away 24 Genshin character Twitter icons!
<color=#ffacff>Genshin:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/genshin.hoyoverse.com/ja/news/detail/104554</color>

<color=#ffd780>December 24, 2020</color>
Dear Travelers, thanks to your continued love and support, Genshin Impact's official YouTube channel has now surpassed one million subscribers!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/112888</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 6, 2023</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
Thanks to Tabibito (Travelers), the number of official Twitter followers has exceeded 1.5 million!
To commemorate this, we will release a special illustration!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1643924034554413060</color>
Genshin Impact Bilibili - 17 Million Followers Celebration

<color=#ffd780>May 29, 2023</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Hello travelers, the number of fans at the official Bilibili of Genshin Impact has exceeded 17 million.
<color=#ffacff>Bilibili:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/t.bilibili.com/800987739990261812</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 23, 2023</color>
#GenshinImpact has reached 10 million followers across all its language accounts on Twitter (X)! To commemorate this moment, we will give away 1,000 pieces of official merchandise to our Travelers to thank them for their continual support and accompaniment!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1694201878077403292</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 29, 2022</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Dear travelers, Pizza Hut x Genshin Impact collaboration is now open. Amber and Eula will share delicious food with you on the journey to the windy land~
<color=#ffacff>Bilibili:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/t.bilibili.com/699684442183041028</color>

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#ffd780>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

materials.name: Firm Arrowhead
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

materials.name: Weathered Arrowhead
materials.desc:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

materials.name: Dvalin's Sigh
materials.desc:
A bit of power taken from the whirlwinds evoked by the Dragon of the East.
Beautiful and transparent, both trade winds and tornadoes will work in his name. The winds move as his companion, his voice, and his freedom.
His enemies are the thousands who stand against the wind.

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage.
<color=#ffd780>Baron Bunny</color>
· Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire.
· Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP.
· When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing <color=#ff9999>AoE Pyro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Hold</color>
Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny.
The longer the button is held, the further the throw.
Baron Bunny hails from a storied lineage, but Amber has stopped keeping count since Baron Bunny the 893rd.

Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous <color=#ff9999>AoE Pyro DMG</color> .
Amber's passion truly burns hot.
Increases the CRIT Rate of <color=#ffd780>Fiery Rain</color> by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.
Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Small Lamp Grass
materials.desc: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

materials.name: Firm Arrowhead
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

materials.name: Everflame Seed
materials.desc:
A seed that fuels the unending flames of the Pyro Regisvine. It emits Pyro energy as if it will burn all that has ever sprouted from the ground.
Endless desires flow among turbulent energy deep within the earth. What desire could steadily hold such fire to the plants and long so eagerly to bathe everything in unquenchable flames?

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - 5-Star Outrider
Amber's outfit. An Outrider's uniform made for maximum mobility.

Obtained Outfit - 100% Outrider
Amber's outfit. This is a more formal — but no less cool — version of the Outrider's uniform!

desc.text:
Amber is an Outrider of the Knights of Favonius. In an age where Outriders are becoming obsolete, she continues on with her responsibilities.
It takes a newcomer only a few days to feel right at home with this passionate girl.
Whether it's before the Good Hunter's signboard, the banks of Cider Lake, or the tree tops at Windrise, one can find traces of this vigilant Outrider in red anywhere.
Once spotted by her, no suspicious individual can ever escape her interrogation.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
From a young age, Amber has always had boundless energy and a positive outlook on life.
Each day, she burns with a fiery enthusiasm that sees her go about her life like a whirlwind, smashing through any obstacle that stands in her way.
At times, however, her excessive energy can make her quite the troublemaker.
Needless to say, she was quite a handful when she was young. Her infamous deeds include accidentally dropping a bird's nest on her grandpa's head while trying to steal the eggs from it and setting a Dendro Slime's leaves on fire, causing it to scurry about like a wild animal. These minor offenses gained her some notoriety among hunters' camps.
Somehow, Amber was always able to escape the scene of the crime whenever she caused an incident, and not even a veteran outrider could catch up with her. Invariably, it was Amber's grandpa who ended up on damage control duty each time his granddaughter's misbehavior caused yet another incident.
To Amber, her grandpa's silent, unconditional love was like a warm breeze that wrapped around her like a blanket. She knew that it was because of this love that he accepted her and took responsibility for her deeds, and she embraced it silently.
But it was only on the day that her grandpa resigned from the Knights of Favonius that she finally understood the full extent of the responsibility he had borne all those years.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
Amber's grandpa was once the leader of a mercenary group. He came from Liyue Harbor and was tasked with protecting merchant caravans as they traversed Teyvat. One day, on a routine escort job, the caravan fell prey to a savage monster attack; he was the only survivor, saved by a doctor from the Knights of Favonius.
Too ashamed to return home and anxious to repay the debt, Amber's grandpa joined the Knights of Favonius.
Before long, he single-handedly founded the Outriders, trained each one of them personally, and began leading them on missions.
It also wasn't long before he found love in the foreign land of Mondstadt and founded a family.
Years later, Amber was born into that family. During the day, she would crouch by the window and secretly watch him training the outriders; at night, she would sneak into the yard and practice the moves he had taught that day.
Amber's grandpa was touched by her enthusiasm, and decided to teach her everything he knew.
"When Mondstadt accepted me, it became my homeland. Then, I decided to watch over this new home of mine. Maybe one day, you will inherit this responsibility... Hah, but then, who knows what the future holds?"
As the coarse skin of her grandpa's palm rubbed against her head, a bewildered but earnest Amber nodded energetically in response.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Something happened one day four years ago that profoundly changed Amber.
That day, her grandpa left his coat of arms and sword in his office and simply disappeared, leaving no note and telling no one he was leaving.
He had been the beating heart and the backbone of the Outrider division, and without his leadership they rapidly became undisciplined and lost their edge.
A few failed operations later, the Outrider division was facing obsoletion. In the end, it was preserved as a part of the Knights' organization, but in name only. Experienced members either transferred to another detachment or resigned, and so few outriders stayed that they simply did not have enough people to fulfill their daily patrol duties.
On top of this, rumors that Amber's grandpa had defected made recovery even more difficult for the struggling Outrider division.
Amber personally experienced this entire episode, having just been admitted to the Outriders before it all began. With the decline of her squad, she experienced true loss and disappointment for the first time in her life. No longer her carefree former self, she was filled with a new determination: She was going to grow up and become a true outrider as quickly as possible, no matter what it took.
She had never made an actual plan before, and lacked the maturity to know where to start. But what she did have was confidence and courage — and lots of it.
She wanted to show she had inherited her grandpa's determination, and she wanted to find out where he had gone.
But more importantly, she wanted to inherit her grandpa's former role and become a loyal protector of her homeland.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
Life in the Knights of Favonius was not easy for Amber in the beginning.
Being as young as she was and having just lived through the trauma of losing her grandpa, the senior knights made a point of taking special care of her.
However, for a girl as desperate to excel as she was, being taken care of by others implied that she wasn't yet mature enough to stand on her own two feet.
Accordingly, she voraciously sought out extra responsibilities and made this as visible as possible to her seniors.
Finally, during an intense engagement with some monsters, the seniors noticed her bravery and resourcefulness in the heat of battle.
That was the moment when they realized that their little girl was growing up.
As she matured, she also became more at ease with herself. Whatever feedback she met with, be it praise, rebuke, silence, or taunting, her response was always the same.
"For sure, I may still have a way to go before I catch up with my seniors. But one day, I'm gonna be the best Outrider ever!"
Amber is not prone to too much deliberation, preferring instead to speak her mind, truthfully and frankly, at every occasion.
She firmly believes that she will not disappoint her grandpa.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
Today, Amber is still the firecracker she always was, burning with endless passion and energy.
Now that she's all grown up, Amber holds firm to her grandpa's teachings as she spreads her Wind Glider's wings and watches over the City of Freedom with the eye of an eagle and the cautious cunning of a bunny rabbit.
The "Crimson Knight" is known throughout Mondstadt.
The people are delighted to see the mischievous little girl they remember growing up to be a guardian they can rely on.
"Never fear, Outrider Amber is here!"
Her self-confidence is simply unshakable:
"I am Outrider Amber, the one and only outrider — which makes me the best one out there!"

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Amber doesn't make writing a daily diary a habit, only electing to write special or memorable events down in her journal.
"I finally caught that magical bird! It's called a Rami... something. I don't remember. But I've been chasing it for three days, and I've only been able to sit down for a proper meal today. That magical bird was a really cunning one, burrowing in the thick forest like that. Good thing I didn't give up! Best of all, Master Jean gave me special permission to pluck a feather plume from it as my reward. Hehe, I'll wear it at my side every single day!"
"I'm sure I followed the cookbook to the letter and grilled the meat for six minutes. But while the outside is charred, the inside isn't cooked yet... Did I not control the heat properly? But I really am hungry, so I'll just have to try again tomorrow. One day, I'll make the best steak, and I'll call it... the Outrider's Champion Steak!"
"I met a strange outlander today. I was suspicious at first, but as it turns out, this outlander is both reliable and capable. Ugh, come to think of it, what would I do if an enemy that strong showed up? ...I musn't fall behind. I must train harder!"

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
Amber once believed that if she took on her grandpa's post, she would understand why he left Mondstadt.
However, even when she officially became an Outrider, she was no closer to unraveling the mystery behind his wordless departure.
Her grandpa had left nothing for her to find either, indicating that she would have to forge her own path.
Amber floundered for a while, until she flipped through an old book of fables that she would eventually come to treasure.
"What you lacked was not wind, but courage. It is courage that has allowed you to become the first flying birds of this world."
Amber realized that she shouldn't wait for directions from someone else, but that she should be like those courageous birds that spread their wings and flew into the blue skies.
"There must be something that only I can do. There must be."
The moment she realized this, a Vision began to shine brightly at her hip.

summaryList.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All

desc.text: Fires 2 arrows per <color=#ffd780>Aimed Shot</color> . The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Fiery Rain</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Decreases <color=#ffd780>Explosive Puppet</color> 's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Explosive Puppet</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
<color=#ffd780>Fiery Rain</color> increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.
